description: Record important information regardless of temperature, precipitation, or greasy stuff on the paper. Useful for backcountry skiers, guides, and anyone needing to take notes while upside down or under water.Polycarbonate barrel with a chrome cap.Gel ink is sealed in a pressurized cartridge that won’t leak under pressure.Writes at any angle. Operates under water and (theoretically) at temperatures from -45 to 200°C.Assorted colours, but no choice is available. Consider this a known unknown.
name: Fisher Apollo Space Pen
